location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Thomas H. Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at [Sultania] to Stephen Babington Esquire, in Charge of the Residency at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Thomas H. Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at [Sultania] to Stephen Babington Esquire, in Charge of the Residency at Bushire, informing that a person named Golawn Hossein was going to deliver two packets to be sent to the Governor in Council at Bombay. The letter was received on 29 July with a note from J. Malcolm at [Kashan] on 8 July saying that he opened the packet and a note by Babington saying that the Envoy's private letters should not be opened by anyone.
